field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the DHCP FreeRADIUS service.

field.label: DNS 1
field.help: Set the first DNS server for this pool.

field.label: DNS 2
field.help: Set the second DNS server for this pool.

field.label: Netmask
field.help: Set the subnet mask for this pool.

field.label: Gateway IP
field.help: Set the gateway IP for this pool. It will be the gateway for the clients and also used as the identifier.
